Translations.Text: Yi liming fashi,
yi shi ye [zhu][ru zhao jin yue de qian 10 ye] fashi,
yi oushu he jishu fashi,
yi xiaoshi shi de ye fashi,
dui you lizhi de renmen, nandao ci zhong [shangshu shiyan] hai meiyou zugou de zhengju ma?
Nandao ni [mu sheng] bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chengzhi a de ren——
ru gao zhu de yi la mu ren ma?
Zai qita difang hai meiyou bei chuangzaoguo zheyang [gao] de ren.
[Nandao ni bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chengzhi] zai shangu zhong zao shi wei wu de sa mu de ren,
yiji yongyou dajun de falao ma?
Tamen ceng zai guonei weifa luan ji,
zuo'eduoduan,
suoyi, ni de zhu jiang yanxing chengfa tamen.
Ni de zhu que shi jianshi [tamen de xingwei] de.
Zhiyu ren, dang ta de zhu ci gei ta rongyao he enhui er kaoyan ta shi, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu ci gei wo rongyaole.”
Dan dang ta suoxiao ta de shengji er kaoyan ta shi, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu lingru wole.”
Bu, shi nimen bu shandai gu'er [zhu][ru bu rang tamen zhenzheng xiangshou jichengquan],
shi nimen bu huxiang guli jipin [zhu],
shi nimen [tanlan de] tunshi bieren de yichan,
shi nimen guofen ku'ai caifu.
Bu, dang dadi wanquan zhen sui,
dang ni de zhu [de mingling] sui cheng pai de tianshi yiqi jianglin shi,
zai na ri, huo yu jiang bei dai jin; zai na ri, ren jiang yuan jieshou quangao, dan [na shi cai] jieshou quangao dui ta you he yichu ne?
Ta jiang shuo:“Yaoshi wo [zai chenshi shi] ceng wei wo de shengming zuo xie shanshi duo hao a!”
Zai na ri, renhe ren de xingfa dou bu xiang ta [an la] de xingfa,
renhe ren de shufu dou bu xiang ta de shufu.
[You hua sheng dui jingwei zhe shuo]:“Anjing de xinling a!
Ni xiyue, shou [zhu] xiyue de guiyu ni de zhu ba!
Ni jinru wo de [shou zunjing de] puren zhong ba!
Ni jinru wo de leyuan ba!”
